main_definition: To make changes to a text or image, usually improving its content, structure, formatting, or visual appearance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To revise and improve the content of written material.
meanings_and_examples.example: After receiving feedback from her colleagues, she went back to edit the report for clarity and accuracy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To modify a digital image or video by adjusting colors, cropping, adding effects, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: Using photo editing software, he edited his family portrait to enhance its brightness and contrast before printing it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To revise a written document for errors in grammar, punctuation, or style.
meanings_and_examples.example: The editor of the magazine meticulously reviewed each article before publication to ensure they were free from mistakes.
